forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Freezing rain this morning, with thunderstorms for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 7C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and thunderstorms. High 47F. ESE winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 30F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 43F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain or freezing rain later at night. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 40F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
